title: 23.01.2026: Lok Bhavan offers tribute to Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose and Balasaheb Thackeray
content:
# 23.01.2026: Lok Bhavan offers tribute to Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose and Balasaheb Thackeray

**Publish Date :January 23, 2026**

---

Lok Bhavan offers tribute to Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose  and Balasaheb Thackeray

Maharashtra Lok Bhavan offered floral tributes to the Founder of the Azad Hind Sena Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose  and Balasaheb Thackeray on the occasion of their birth anniversary on Friday  (23rd Jan).

Secretary to the Governor Dr. Prashant Narnaware offered floral tributes to the portraits of Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose  and Balasaheb Thackeray on the occasion.

Joint Secretary to the Governor S. Ramamoorthy, Comptroller of the Governorâ€™s Households Dr Nishikant Deshpande and officers and staff of Lok Bhavan also paid their tributes to Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose  and Balasaheb Thackeray.
